subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
Medicine and Health
Heart
lead_paragraph: Soccer players have dropped dead at an increasing rate in the era of advanced medical science, a fact that disturbs Michel d’Hooghe, a doctor who heads FIFA’s medical committee.
snippet: Soccer players have dropped dead at an increasing rate in the era of advanced medical science, a fact that disturbs Michel d’Hooghe, a doctor who heads FIFA’s medical committee.
